Description: Business as usual: get in[;] rob a few enemies[;] defeat the|boss[;] get out.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Start Game: Rules.includerareenemies = false; Rules.includeenemies([~Alchemist~]); Rules.excludeenemies([~Aurora~[;]~Mimic~[;]~Keymaster~[;]~Crystalina~]); //removed wisp from blacklist since new vanish implementation can deal with player getting fool's fire

Description: Get those pickpocketing fingers ready - this time[;] you're|stealing for keeps.
Rules Description: You can keep enemy equipment after each fight.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|All enemy equipment is upgraded.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Cowbell~[;]~Equipment:Wrecking Ball~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Berlin Key~[;] ~Equipment:Bronze Cauldron~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment([~DoubleEquipment:Dagger[;]Lockpick~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Wrecking Ball[;]Pea Shooter~[;] ~DoubleEquipment:Dagger[;]Berlin Key~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Nunchucks[;]Master Key~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Poison Needle[;]Singularity~]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;] ~Equipment:Dagger~[;] ~Equipment:Lockpick~[;]rand([~Equipment:Crowbar~[;]~Equipment:Wrecking Ball~])]; var rewards2 = [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Equipment:Backstab~[;] ~Equipment:Berlin Key~[;] ~Equipment:Bronze Cauldron~[;] ~Equipment:Nunchucks~[;]~Equipment:Slingshot~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] rewards2.pop()[;] ~Upgrade~]); }

Description: Manage your inventory the Inventor-y way: turn those|boring old swords and shields into neat little gadgets!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Flamethrower~[;]~Equipment:Doppeldice~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Metal~[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: There's so much equipment lying around - why make one|gadget after each combat when you can make two? Wait[;]|not [quote][]can[quote][] - [quote][]must[quote][][;] that's the word.
Rules Description: Find extra equipment.|Start with double equipment[;] and upgraded [yellow]Hammers[].|Make twice as many gadgets.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Flamethrower~[;]~Equipment:Doppeldice~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Metal~[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: In a damp and grimy dungeon[;] some of your equipment is|bound to break eventually. It's lucky you're so good at|improvisation!
Rules Description: Don't create gadgets after each fight.|All equipment is reuseable.|All equipment breaks after 4 uses.|Broken equipment immediately becomes a gadget.

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|All enemy equipment is upgraded.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Flamethrower~[;]~Equipment:Doppeldice~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Metal~[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Molotov Cocktail~[;]~Equipment:Doppeltwice~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]rand([~Equipment:Scrap Book~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Club~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Spear~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Nettle~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Bump~])[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment([~InitialEquipment:Hammer~[;]~InitialEquipment:Screwdriver~[;] ~InitialEquipment:Shovel~[;]~InitialEquipment:Whip~[;]~InitialEquipment:Lament~]);  leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]rand([~Equipment:Scrap Book~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Club~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Spear~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Nettle~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Bump~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Metal~])[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Screwdriver~[;] ~Equipment:Flamethrower~[;] ~Equipment:Chainsaw~[;] ~Equipment:Doppeltwice~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 2); }

Description: Hey[;] wouldn't it be cool if you stole ALL of an enemy's|equipment[;] every time you fought? Let's find out!
Rules Description: After defeating an enemy[;] keep all of their equipment.|New [yellow]Delete[] skills destroys cards permanently.
